title: Bug 116609[Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
description: Bug 116609[Regression] Color orange doesn't work. Description: The color orange is not being applied correctly. When setting the color or background color to orange, the expected behavior is that the element should be displayed in the color orange. However, the observed behavior is that the color does not change to orange.
OB: When setting the color or background color to orange, the color of the element does not change to orange as expected.
EB: When setting the color or background color to orange, the element should be displayed in the color orange.
SR:
1. Insert a report item. 
2. Set the color or background color to orange. 
3. Observe that the color of the element does not change to orange.
